attribute.name: Lethargy
attribute.description: Lethargy is the only attribute that can't be manually increased or decreased. It's an attribute that is dependent on other attributes. Sometimes you reach your turn more often than the enemies, because the enemies have a higher lethargy than you. This opens up a lot of possibilities. During fights, the lethargy counter goes up, and every time the counter reaches the manifold of your lethargy, its your turn again. This makes it possible for you to have multiple consecutive actions during one fight turn.

attribute.name: Alacrity
attribute.description: Describes your agility and how nimble you are.
attribute.lethargyDescription: Your agility directly influences your ability to act.

attribute.name: Awareness
attribute.lethargyDescription: Being aware of your surroundings help you to make quick decisions.

attribute.name: Brilliance
attribute.lethargyDescription: Your higher wit equals a higher risk assessment. This slows down your actions.

attribute.name: Empathy
attribute.lethargyDescription: Has no direct effect on your lethargy.

attribute.name: Transcendence
attribute.lethargyDescription: Has no direct effect on your lethargy.

attribute.name: Vigor
attribute.lethargyDescription: The heavier and stronger you are, the more slowly you act and the more energy your body needs.
